name: MasterKey ：Find Treasure
description:
You are a treasure hunter who has acquired the keys to countless treasure chests. You must travel into the forest, through the caves, across the beach, and onto the pirate ship in search of treasure!

This is an addictive and unique puzzle game in which you swipe keys around the board to open doors and unlock treasure chests. Swiping the screen moves all keys at the same time. You can swipe left, right, and down, but not up! Can you unlock all of the treasure chests without getting stuck?

***CAN YOU UNLOCK THEM ALL?***
==>Beautiful graphics, sounds, and music with a pirate island feel
==>120 unique and challenging levels spanning 4 different regions
==>13 achievements to earn, keeping the gameplay fun long after beating the game
==>3 difficulties
==>4 enchanting songs

热爱寻宝吗?热爱发挥你的智力嘛?本游戏是一个出色的寻宝智力游戏,深受国外玩家的喜爱,希望聪明的您也会喜欢。

该游戏分4个场景,共有120关。每一个场景的30关都通过后才能进入到下一个地点。您要依次经过森林、山谷、海滩最后到达海盗船,最大的宝藏就在那里。而且每关可以设置难易模式,如果你能用最快的方法找到宝藏则可以获得一颗星星,好好发挥您的智力吧,看看自己能否获得所有的星星,并且寻到最大的宝藏！

宝藏藏在宝箱里,通过手势来控制钥匙的移动,然后要用您的万能钥匙把它们打开,把所有宝箱打开后则成功过关.

不要再犹豫,赶紧开始你的寻宝之旅吧!!!
